titles.title: EITC for Older Workers Act of 2024
EITC for Older Workers Act of 2024
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the upper age limit on eligibility for the earned income tax credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
EITC for Older Workers Act of 2024
This bill repeals the upper age limit (i.e., age 65) on eligibility for the earned income tax credit.
